Am I a per -- son of life? Do I ex -- pe -- ri -- ence life? Does my liv -- ing bear the is -- sues of life? Good trees bear good fruit; Health -- y plant, health -- y root; Oh Lord! The ground in my heart!

lyrics.stanza: When I first believed, and His life I received, The seed was sown into me. Now this seed must grow, and this zoe life flow As on to maturity.
We know that life's seed is growing indeed When fruits of life are expressed Such as virtues of joy, peace, faithfulness, love. Does my daily life pass the test?
When these virtues show others surely will know The beauty of life will shine, And the gospel word of life will be heard Bringing many to know life divine!
Lord grant me today, a new start in this way. A person of life I would be— Just expressing You in all that I do. Oh may this life flow out of me!
